content:
TITLE: Generating a QR code in the terminal
DESCRIPTION: This code generates a QR code in the terminal for the provided string. The default error level is 'L'. The function `qrcode.generate()` takes the string to encode as input and displays the QR code in the console.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
qrcode.generate('This will be a QRCode, eh!');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing qrcode-terminal in Node.js
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to import the `qrcode-terminal` library into a Node.js project using the `require` function. This allows you to use the library's functions within your application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var qrcode = require('qrcode-terminal');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating a QR code string using a callback
DESCRIPTION: This code generates a QR code string using a callback function. The callback function receives the QR code as a string, which can then be used for further processing.  The code avoids writing directly to the terminal.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
qrcode.generate('http://github.com', function (qrcode) {
    console.log(qrcode);
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing qrcode-terminal as a Node.js library
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the qrcode-terminal package locally within a Node.js project. This allows you to import and use the library within your javascript code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ npm install qrcode-terminal
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing qrcode-terminal via npm
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the qrcode-terminal package globally using npm.  This allows the `qrcode-terminal` command to be run from the command line.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ npm install -g qrcode-terminal
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating a QR code from the command line
DESCRIPTION: This command generates a QR code for the provided URL using the `qrcode-terminal` command-line tool. The QR code is displayed in the terminal.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ qrcode-terminal 'http://github.com'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating a small QR code
DESCRIPTION: This code generates a small QR code in the terminal.  The `small` option reduces the size of the QR code output.  An optional callback function can be provided.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
qrcode.generate('This will be a small QRCode, eh!', {small: true});

qrcode.generate('This will be a small QRCode, eh!', {small: true}, function (qrcode) {
    console.log(qrcode)
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating a QR code from piped input
DESCRIPTION: This command generates a QR code from input piped to the `qrcode-terminal` command-line tool. The QR code is displayed in the terminal.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ echo 'http://github.com' | qrcode-terminal
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting the QR code error level
DESCRIPTION: This code sets the error correction level for the QR code to 'Q'.  After setting the error level, subsequent calls to `qrcode.generate` will use the new error level.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
qrcode.setErrorLevel('Q');
qrcode.generate('This will be a QRCode with error level Q!');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying command-line help
DESCRIPTION: This command displays the help information for the `qrcode-terminal` command-line tool, listing available options and usage examples.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gtanner/qrcode-terminal/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ qrcode-terminal --help
```
